## NormalizedAssetReferenceHandlerType type

Function from which we take a INormalizedAsset and transform it into a
description from which we can initiate an HTTP call to copy items from.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type NormalizedAssetReferenceHandlerType = (
  asset: INormalizedAsset,
) => INormalizedAssetReferenceType
```
